Name: Squeezy not Smiley
Description: Abby wants to try Startorch Academy's cafeteria dishes.
QuestDesc: Abby wants to try Startorch Academy's cafeteria dishes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sniff-sniff... I'm hungry...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey {PlayerName}! I just overheard some students in the hall going on and on about the cafeteria's "Canned Surprise." Said it's super sweet, spongy, and just loaded with good-smelling jam...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... I don't think that's what they have on the menu today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: W-Wait a minute. Are they sold out?! That means today it's... Squeezy Jelly? Never had those before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the name has a sweet ring to it. I'll bet it's just as good! How about we order two and give it a go?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A moment later, you find yourself holding two Complete Nutrition Squeezy Jellies in your hands.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This packaging... feels...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, we already paid for these... Can't let it go to waste. I'll go first!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Abby twists open the cap, pinches the green packaging with its paws, and slurps in a huge mouthful.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You watch as Abby's expression goes from confused to wondering, and its staring eyes gradually turn blank...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did someone hit the pause button on Abby...?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Abby? Abby? Everything all right in there?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is it really that bad?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not that! It's just... it's just... It's like I ate something, but ate nothing at all...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or it's just me, {PlayerName}. You give it a try... maybe?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You twist open the cap the same way Abby did, and slurp up a mouthful of jelly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before you realize, that calm, nutritious, essential flavor, so normal and pliable with its texture of complete emptiness, softly slides away from your taste buds.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Feels like I ate something, and yet ate nothing at all...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Change of flavor? Heh, as long as it's not the current flavor that makes you feel like you're floating aimlessly inside the void, anything's fine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if I had to choose... I'd like to try a "Jinzhou Stew" flavor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's a dish from my home. Back when I was visiting the Jinzhou Campus of Huaxu Academy, I had some with Principal Investigator Xiangli Yao!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's all because of him that I set out on the path of scientific research. I still remember that meal like it was yesterday.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Piping hot meat and veggies, garnished with a sprinkle of Lemongrass. Mm-mmm! Sweet aroma!

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A flavor? ... Hmm... You know, even though the cafeteria says the Jelly is convenient and nutrient-packed, I just don't think it should be presented the way it is now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Normally, food like this is called snacks... right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I want a Bamboo Iris Crisps-flavored Jelly. That's the arena snack I had when I rode a Gondola to Septimont to watch Gladiator tournaments.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I love that crispy, crunchy texture and flowery aroma... When I'm grinding for a paper, having something sweet helps keep me in a good mood.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plus, I haven't been home in years. From what I can tell from my mom's letters, a lot of things happened over there. I really wish I could go back for a visit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bamboo Iris Crisps? I don't have anything against it. Personally, I love trying out something novel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Although, since this is about making a good first impression for the new-and-improved Squeezy Jelly, we should do our due diligence for the sake of our fellow students!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about we play a game of Peaks of Prestige?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chengxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll snack as we duel. Since they want it to be more like a snack, I'm sure it'll go well with a fun activity like Peaks of Prestige!

Options.PlotLineKey: Sure, but why over a duel?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinzhou Stew...

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not that I don't like to try cuisines from other regions, it's just its flavor sounds a little heavy to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Combining this sort of flavor with jelly... doesn't sound very promising to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alba
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if you can beat me at a round of Peaks of Prestige, I'll give it a try.

Options.PlotLineKey: Sure, but why over a duel?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're back. What did the students say? Which flavor do they want to try out?

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. I'll pass your suggestion along.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come taste the new Squeezy Jelly tomorrow. I hope it can satisfy your taste buds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pardon me, my name is Gianluca. I work at the cafeteria.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To be frank... you're not the first student to have given feedback regarding the Squeezy Jelly's taste.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Squeezy Jelly was originally developed as a convenient nutrient supplement. It's supposed to offer portability, adaptability, and maximize nutrition in one single package.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Startorch Academy also takes taste into consideration when developing a new product. As a matter of fact, this product supports customizable flavors.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To accommodate this "customizability," it's only natural that the taste tends to be... neutral, before the flavor has been set.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No wonder I couldn't taste a thing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While on paper the idea may sound great, we've run into some snags in its implementation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since Squeezy Jelly was advertised as a convenience food, it's understandable that the faculty and students chose it for that very reason. The ready-to-eat feature during harsh expedition environments like the Roya Frostlands, for example.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, as you can imagine, we ended up not having enough development time to implement a flavor. The design goals of "customizability" and "convenience" kind of go against each other.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To remedy the situation, the cafeteria would like to release a few select-flavored Jellies that change weekly. Perhaps it can make the product more acceptable to a greater audience.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I'd like to ask your help in gathering and organizing feedback from other students, so we can decide on what flavor to test out for this week.

Options.PlotLineKey: For science! And for a new jelly!
For no more empty flavors in the cafeteria...

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, I really appreciate it. I'll await your results here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The new Squeezy Jelly flavor is out! Time for a taste test...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mm! Hmm... hmm...? Hmmm...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Abby's expression gradually changes from excitement to confusion. At least this time, its eyes didn't go completely blank.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Does it still taste like nothing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! I can feel something, but... it's strange... It's not quite what I imagined...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You take a slurp. The jelly has an intense flavor this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It explodes at the tip of your tongue like fireworks, but only for a brief moment before vanishing. At the same time, you get a twisted sensation of feeling full.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And what ultimately lingers on your tongue is still just... bland emptiness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After listening to your suggestion, the cafeteria had an emergency meeting the entire night and decided to add the flavoring around the Squeezy Jelly's straw.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The jelly itself is still the same, but at the moment you take a sip, it passes through the flavored portion of the straw to give you the illusion of having the food of that flavor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It provides a variety of flavors without impacting its original convenience-oriented design, while also keeping the consumer's breath fresh! It's a win-win-win scenario!

Dialogues.Speaker: Gianluca
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It feels... feels...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Feels like I ate something.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And yet ate nothing at all...
